Sentence.sentence: That part of Brazil is very dry and farming is often difficult there.

In mature, fully developed countries such as the UK, more-efficient farming practices and better transport, storage and processing facilities ensure that a larger proportion of the food produced reaches markets and consumers.
Land Usage: Over the last five decades, improved farming techniques and technologies have helped to significantly increase crop yields along with a 12% expansion of farmed land use
However, a further increase in farming area without impacting unfavourably on what remains of the world's natural ecosystems appears unlikely.
